Articles.Content:
Hey!

I recently tried downloading Better Atmospheres, but I noticed it was for 0.25. Can someone please link me to a 1.0.5 one? Also, my EVE Mod is deciding not to work either. Can someone please help?

For the EVE problem I would recommend looking through the EVE thread to see if there's already a fix mentioned.

If not you can ask on that thread - read the first post carefully - rbray89 tells you what you need to provide before he will help you.
